articles.title: Justin Trudeau heads to Europe to help organize more sanctions against Russia - Toronto Star
articles.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau travels to Europe next week to co-ordinate new sanctions against Russia and support for Ukraine — a trip that has become more urgent in the wake of a Russian attack that endangered a nuclear plant.

articles.title: Wheat prices hit 14-year highs after Russian invasion of Ukraine - CBC News
articles.description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine, often called the "breadbasket of Europe," has driven wheat prices to 14-year highs, forcing bread consumers to eat the cost.
articles.content:
Russia's invasion of Ukraine, often called the "breadbasket of Europe," has driven wheat prices to 14-year highs, forcing bread consumers to eat the cost.

articles.title: Europe sizes up renewables to reduce reliance on Russian gas - CNA
articles.description:
LONDON: As Russian troops encircle the Ukrainian capital Kyiv, European governments are scrambling to mitigate their exposure to Russian gas supplies in the face of public outcry over dependence on Moscow's energy.
